name: Red Plague
description:
Red Plague is a 3rd Person Horde Survival Game, Made in One Week!

The goal of this project was to plan and implement a short game to completion.

This Project began on 25/10/2018 til 04/11/2018.

Red Plague was Developed By Thai Daye, James Vigor and Jack Eustace. 

Thai Daye - Technical Artist
Design, Weapons (Models), Enemies(Physics), Materials, item Pickup, Environment, Waves.

James Vigor - Programmer
Weapons (Functionality), User Interface (Art), Artificial Intelligence (Reds, Civilians), Sound Effects.

Jack Eustace - Programmer
User Interface (Functionality), Item Pickup (Functionality), Objects.

You can find us @:
